name: market for sodium ethyl xanthate | sodium ethyl xanthate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25394/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'sodium ethyl xanthate' in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;;Sodium ethyl xanthate is an organic substance with a CAS no.: 000140-90-9. It is called sodium O-ethylcarbonodithioate under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: C3H5OS2Na. It is solid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure and has a characteristic sulfurous odor. It is modelled as a pure substance. On a consumer level, is used in the following products: metals, metal surface treatment products, adsorbents, polymers and extraction agents. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: mining, chemicals, metals and pulp, paper and paper products.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'sodium ethyl xanthate', within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'sodium ethyl xanthate' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
